JobShortDescription: Is developing Kotlin apps your passion? Are you used to working with highly skilled co-workers? Join our team!
JobDescription:
Are you a seasoned Android Developer, seeking an exciting career move? Join us to shape the future!
Step into a new adventure next month, as an essential part of our dynamic team
Craft a cutting-edge app for a diverse client base – a blank canvas awaiting your touch
Your expertise, insights, and innovation will drive this venture, shaping its core
As a key member, lead with your seasoned perspective, contributing and guiding our journey
Enjoy flexibility and collaboration
One office day weekly fosters team bonding, while remote work empowers your productivity
Note: Dutch work permit & residency are essential
Immerse in this opportunity seamlessly
Ready to innovate, explore, and leave your mark? Join us and let your Kotlin brilliance shine!


Apply now
JobCriteria:
In order to be successful in this role, you will at least need the following:

Functional programming concepts
Gradle and multi-module projects
Architectural patterns – CLEAN, MVVM vs MVP
Android architecture components
Kotlin + Kotlin ktx, Android Jetpack, Coroutines
Rest APls, JSON and serialized data
AndroidX, Material Design, Theming + Styling views
The trade-offs when using third party libraries

Note: The agencies we work with are looking for app builders who are in the possesion of a Dutch work permit ánd reside in The Netherlands
Unfortunately, our clients do not work with people on a remote basis
JobSalaryBenefits:
You will receive a competitive salary

In addition, our client offers a generous package of fringe benefits:
Extensive vacation arrangement
Space for personal development
The latest hardware to work with
Reimbursement of travel expenses

For questions about this or the other vacancies, please contact Jacqueline , email: info@thehouseofappril
com or call: 020- 215 7446
Love to help you with a new job

JobCompany.JobCompanyProfile: Our client is creating apps for the citizens of the Netherlands.
JobCompany.JobCompanyCulture: Hi there! We are The House of Appril, the only Dutch talent agency specialised in app professionals that helps you with great app development jobs in The Netherlands. We are Firmly rooted in the community and as organiser of the Appril Festival, something we have been doing since 2012! We support the Dutch app community and we have a large network of interesting companies. We provide you with plenty of guidance: online and offline, we support you with your resume, interview advice and our network. The House of Appril's unique approach helps you find your next job or gig.

JobShortDescription:
You are an iOS Developer/ SwiftUI wizard
Looking for a new job and you speak Dutch? Let's connect!
JobDescription:
Are you a seasoned iOS Developer with a strong grasp of SwiftUI, seeking an exciting career move? Join us to shape the future!
Step into a new adventure next month, as an essential part of our dynamic team
Craft a cutting-edge app for a diverse client base – a blank canvas awaiting your touch
Your expertise, insights, and innovation will drive this venture, shaping its core
As a key member, lead with your seasoned perspective, contributing and guiding our journey
Enjoy flexibility and collaboration
One office day weekly fosters team bonding, while remote work empowers your productivity


Note: Dutch work permit & residency are essential
Immerse in this opportunity seamlessly


Ready to innovate, explore, and leave your mark? Join us and let your iOS brilliance shine!


Apply now
JobCriteria:
We are looking for an iOS, SwiftUI developer to join the mobility team



- Demonstrable knowledge of Swift
- Experience with SwiftUI
- Familiar with MVVM pattern
- You love to solve problems
- Speaks Dutch

**Note:** The agencies we work with are looking for app builders with a Dutch work permit and live in The Netherlands
JobSalaryBenefits:
We will do our best to you the best possible salary!
For questions about this or the other vacancies, please contact Jacqueline, email: info@thehouseofappril
com or call: 020- 215 7446
Love to help you with a new job

JobCompany.JobCompanyProfile: This app is for the Dutch government. We love to tell you more about it but you need to speak Dutch!
JobCompany.JobCompanyCulture:
Hi there! We are The House of Appril, the only Dutch agency specialised in matching talented app developers with the top app creating companies in The Netherlands. Firmly rooted in the community and as organizer of the Appril Festival, we know what drives you as developer.

When you apply for a job with The House of Appril you get access to our large network of interesting companies, an honest interest in what drives you and above all: a challenging job or project that fits you like a glove. 

So apply today, enter The House and see for yourself!

JobDescription:
Are you a seasoned Mobile (Senior) Designer, passionate about crafting exceptional user experiences? Join our team and shape the future!
Step into a new adventure next month, becoming an integral part of our dynamic team
Design cutting-edge mobile experiences for a diverse client base – your creativity is the key to unlocking potential
Your expertise, insights, and innovation will drive this venture, shaping its core
As a key member, your seasoned perspective will guide our journey to excellence
Embrace flexibility and collaboration
With just one office day per week, you'll foster team connections, while remote work enhances your productivity


Note: Dutch work permit & residency are required
Seamlessly immerse yourself in this opportunity


Ready to pioneer, explore, and make your mark? Join us and let your design brilliance shine!


Apply now
JobSalaryBenefits:
This role is with a permanent contract, The House of Appril will help you with this when the time comes
You will receive a market conform salary
In addition, out client offers a royal package of additional benefits

For questions about this or the other vacancies, please contact us: info@thehouseofappril
com or call: 020- 215 7446
We love to help you with a new job!
